TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RegistryProxy extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.

span.span: Provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用這些屬性，您必須具有讀取和寫入權限，從列舉型別。To use these properties, you must have Read and Write permission from the enumeration. 以完全信任執行的任何程式碼 （在預設的安全性原則，這是安裝在使用者的本機硬碟上的任何程式碼） 具有存取登錄的必要權限。Any code running with full trust (under the default security policy, this is any code installed on the user's local hard drive) has the necessary permissions to access the registry. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |從登錄讀取資料Read data from the registry|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取該值`Name`從`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`並將它顯示在訊息方塊。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

summary.span: Returns a type which provides access to .

span.span: Returns a type which provides access to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` 主要用來儲存在 Windows 中的檔案關聯的相關資訊。`HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` is primarily used to store information about file associations in Windows. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數存取。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與僅這些必要權限可完成工作。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入登錄變數的存取權。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數存取。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數中。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取權限。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入權限。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會取得名稱的子機碼`ClassesRoot`登錄機碼並將其加入`ListBox1`。This example gets the names of the subkeys for the `ClassesRoot` registry key and adds them to `ListBox1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#10)] 此範例中，您需要`ListBox`名為`ListBox1`專案中。This example requires that you have a `ListBox` named `ListBox1` in your project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` 主要用來在電腦上儲存裝置的設定。`HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` is primarily used to store settings for devices on the computer. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數存取。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與僅這些必要權限可完成工作。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入登錄變數的存取權。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數存取。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數中。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取權限。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入權限。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會建立子機碼`MyDeviceSettings`。This example creates the subkey `MyDeviceSettings`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` 主要用來儲存每位使用者的設定，例如色彩和字型，在 Windows 中。`HKEY_CURRENT_USER` is primarily used to store per-user settings, such as colors and fonts, in Windows. 索引鍵會因使用者而有所不同。The key differ according to the user. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數存取。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入登錄變數的存取權。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數存取。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數中。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取權限。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入權限。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此範例會刪除子機碼`Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`。This example deletes the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_DYNDATA` 用來儲存動態登錄資料，例如虛擬裝置驅動程式所使用的資料，並只在 Windows 95/98 系統上支援。`HKEY_DYNDATA` is used to store dynamic registry data, such as that used by Virtual Device Drivers and is supported only on Windows 95/98 systems. 在非 Windows 95/98 系統上呼叫任何方法所傳回索引鍵`Registry.DynData`，這類`CreateSubKey`， `DeleteSubKey`， `GetSubKeyCount`，`GetValueCount`等，將會擲回。On non-Windows 95/98 systems, calling any methods of the key returned by `Registry.DynData`, such as `CreateSubKey`, `DeleteSubKey`, `GetSubKeyCount`, `GetValueCount`, etc., will throw a . 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數存取。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入登錄變數的存取權。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數存取。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數中。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取權限。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入權限。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此範例會刪除子機碼的樹狀結構`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example deletes the subkey tree `Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `valueName` 不區分大小寫。`valueName` is not case-sensitive. 登錄機碼可以包含一個不是任何名稱相關聯的值。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 當這個未命名的值顯示在登錄編輯程式中時，字串 「 （預設） 」 會出現而不是名稱。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要擷取這個未命名的值，指定 null 或空字串 ("") 的`valueName`。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either null or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 下表列出與工作的範例`GetValue`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `GetValue` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取該值`Name`從`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`，並顯示在`MessageBox`。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a `MessageBox`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` 通常用來儲存不會在 Windows 中改變使用者的設定。`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` is usually used to store settings that do not vary from user to user in Windows. 電腦的所有使用者都共用此金鑰。All users of the computer share this key. 其五個子機碼 (`Hardware`， `SAM`， `Security`， `Software`，和`System`) 保存在本機電腦的組態資料。Its five subkeys (`Hardware`, `SAM`, `Security`, `Software`, and `System`) hold configuration data for the local machine. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數存取。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入登錄變數的存取權。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數存取。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數中。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取權限。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入權限。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此範例會開啟子機碼`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`，然後將值`FontColor`至`"red"`。This example opens the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences` and sets the value `FontColor` to `"red"`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

span.span: Returns a type, which provides access to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` 用來存取軟體元件的效能資訊。`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` is used to access performance information for software components. 當它安裝，並將計數器資料的寫入，當它執行時，每個軟體元件就會建立它的物件和計數器的金鑰。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 這項資料不會儲存在登錄中，雖然登錄用來存取它。This data is not stored in the registry, although the registry is used to access it. 相反地，呼叫登錄函數，透過`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA`會使系統收集適當的系統物件管理員中的資料。Instead, calling registry functions via `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers. 這個索引鍵不存在於 Windows 98 系統;嘗試使用它呼叫以外`Name`方法會擲回。This key does not exist on Windows 98 systems; an attempt to use it other than calling the `Name` method will throw an . 此機碼無法正常寫入;嘗試在其上建立子機碼將會擲回。This key cannot normally be written to; attempting to create a subkey on it will throw an . 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數存取。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入登錄變數的存取權。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數存取。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數中。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取權限。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入權限。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會取得該值`ThisSoftware`從`MyCompany`子機碼。This example gets the value `ThisSoftware` from the `MyCompany` subkey. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的索引鍵或值不存在，它會建立它。If the specified key or value does not exist, it is created. 以下是範例工作涉及`My.Computer.Registry.SetValue`方法。Here is an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |登錄機碼中設定的值Set a value in a registry key|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| ## Examples 此範例會將值`FontColor`為 「 紅色 」 索引鍵中`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example sets the value `FontColor` to "red" in the key `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_USERS` 主要用來儲存使用者第一次的預設設定。`HKEY_USERS` is primarily used to store default settings for first-time users. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數存取。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|登錄變數的存取權Access to Registry Variables| |-----------|----------------------------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、讀取和寫入Create, read, and write| |建立Create|建立Create| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取。No access.| |讀取Read|讀取Read| |WriteWrite|WriteWrite| 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |**若要****To**|**請參閱****See**| |------------|-------------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此範例會計算，並顯示登錄機碼中的值數目。This example counts and displays the number of values in the registry key. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#4)]
